mapper.select:
SELECT C.BIZ_AREA_LNM AS BIZAREA_NM
,TO_CHAR(SUM(A.TBL_CNT), '999,999,999,999') AS TBL_CNT ,TO_CHAR(SUM(A.COL_CNT), '999,999,999,999') AS COL_CNT ,TO_CHAR(COUNT(A.BR_ID), '999,999,999,999') AS BRA_CNT ,TO_CHAR(SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(X.ER_CNT,0) > 0 THEN 1 END), '999,999,999,999') AS ERR_CNT ,DECODE(SUM(COALESCE(X.ANA_CNT,0)),0,0,ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(X.ER_CNT,0))*100/SUM(COALESCE(X.ANA_CNT,0)),2)) AS ERR_RATE
FROM (SELECT M.BR_ID ,M.BIZ_AREA_ID ,COUNT(T.CNT)AS TBL_CNT ,SUM(C.CNT) AS COL_CNT FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC_TBL_NM ,COUNT(*)AS CNT FROM WAT_DBC_TBL GROUP BY DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC_TBL_NM )T ON M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = T.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND UPPER(M.DBC_TBL_NM) = UPPER(T.DBC_TBL_NM) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC_TBL_NM ,COUNT(*)AS CNT FROM WAT_DBC_COL AA LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH BB ON AA.DB_SCH_ID = BB.DB_SCH_ID GROUP BY DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC_TBL_NM )C ON M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND UPPER(T.DBC_TBL_NM) = UPPER(C.DBC_TBL_NM) WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') GROUP BY M.BR_ID, M.BIZ_AREA_ID )A INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON A.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA C ON C.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.UPP_BIZ_AREA_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND C.BIZ_AREA_LVL = 2 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.BR_ID ,A.ANA_CNT ,A.ER_CNT ,A.ANA_DGR FROM WAM_BR_RESULT A WHERE ANA_DGR = (SELECT MAX(ANA_DGR) FROM WAM_BR_RESULT B WHERE A.BR_ID = B.BR_ID AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = B.ANA_STR_DTM) )X ON A.BR_ID = X.BR_ID GROUP BY C.BIZ_AREA_LNM

SELECT C.BIZ_AREA_LNM AS BIZAREA_NM ,COUNT(M.BR_ID) AS BRA_CNT ,SUM(DECODE(R.ER_CNT, 0, 0, 1 ))AS IMP_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN E.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL AND R.ER_CNT <> E.ER_CNT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS ERR_PRC ,SUM(CASE WHEN I.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL AND E.ER_CNT <> I.IMP_CNT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS IMP_PRC ,SUM(CASE WHEN I.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL AND E.ER_CNT = I.IMP_CNT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS IMP_END FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON M.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA C ON C.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.UPP_BIZ_AREA_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND C.BIZ_AREA_LVL = 2 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.BR_ID ,A.ER_CNT ,A.ANA_DGR ,A.ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_BR_RESULT A WHERE A.ANA_DGR = (SELECT MAX(B.ANA_DGR) FROM WAM_BR_RESULT B WHERE A.BR_ID = B.BR_ID ) )R ON M.BR_ID = R.BR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_IM_ACT_MSTR A ON R.BR_ID = A.ANA_JOB_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = A.ANA_STR_DTM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ANA_JOB_ID ,ANA_STR_DTM ,COUNT(*) AS ER_CNT FROM WAM_CS_ANA_CD GROUP BY ANA_JOB_ID, ANA_STR_DTM )E ON R.BR_ID = E.ANA_JOB_ID AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = E.ANA_STR_DTM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ANA_STR_DTM ,ANA_JOB_ID ,COUNT(*) AS IMP_CNT FROM WAM_IM_ACT_CD GROUP BY ANA_STR_DTM, ANA_JOB_ID )I ON R.BR_ID = I.ANA_JOB_ID AND A.ANA_STR_DTM = I.ANA_STR_DTM WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
GROUP BY C.BIZ_AREA_LNM

SELECT B.BIZ_AREA_LNM AS BIZAREA_NM , COUNT(M.BR_ID) AS BR_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN R.BR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ANA_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN R.ER_CNT > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ERR_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN C.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CS_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN I.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS IM_CNT FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON M.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.BR_ID ,A.ER_CNT ,A.ANA_DGR ,A.ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_BR_RESULT A WHERE A.ANA_DGR = (SELECT MAX(B.ANA_DGR) FROM WAM_BR_RESULT B -- 업무규칙별 최근차수 ??? -- 최근차수의 업무규칙 -- WHERE A.BR_ID = B.BR_ID ) )R ON M.BR_ID = R.BR_ID --개선계획 LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR C ON R.BR_ID = C.ANA_JOB_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = C.ANA_STR_DTM --개선활동 LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_IM_ACT_MSTR I ON C.ANA_JOB_ID = I.ANA_JOB_ID AND C.ANA_STR_DTM = I.ANA_STR_DTM WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') GROUP BY B.BIZ_AREA_LNM ORDER BY 3 DESC , 4 DESC

SELECT SUM(R.ANA_CNT) AS ANA_ACT_CNT ,SUM(R.ER_CNT) AS ERR_CNT ,DECODE(SUM(R.ANA_CNT),0,100,DECODE(SUM(R.ER_CNT),0,0,ROUND(((SUM(R.ER_CNT))/SUM(R.ANA_CNT)*100),2))) AS ERR_RATE FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB INNER JOIN (SELECT BR_ID ,DB_CONN_TRG_ID FROM WAM_BR_MSTR WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )M ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN (SELECT A.BR_ID ,B.DQI_ID FROM (SELECT BR_ID ,DQI_ID FROM WAM_BR_DQI_MAP WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )A INNER JOIN (SELECT A.DQI_LNM ,A.DQI_ID ,CASE WHEN A.DQI_LVL > 1 THEN (SELECT DQI_LNM FROM WAM_DQI WHERE DQI_ID = A.UPP_DQI_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )END AS UPP_DQI_NM ,A.UPP_DQI_ID FROM (SELECT * FROM WAM_DQI WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) A START WITH A.DQI_LVL = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.DQI_ID = UPP_DQI_ID )B ON A.DQI_ID = B.DQI_ID )DQI ON M.BR_ID = DQI.BR_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT BR_ID ,ANA_DGR ,ANA_CNT ,ER_CNT FROM WAM_BR_RESULT WHERE ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL )R ON M.BR_ID = R.BR_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT BR_ID ,MAX(ANA_DGR) AS ANA_DGR FROM WAM_BR_RESULT GROUP BY BR_ID )X ON R.BR_ID = X.BR_ID AND R.ANA_DGR = X.ANA_DGR

SELECT '진단대상DB' AS CNT_NAME
,TO_CHAR(COUNT(DB_CONN_TRG_ID), '999,999,999,999') AS TOT_CNT ,'/dq/criinfo/anatrg/anadbmsrqst.do?linkFlag=1' AS PAGE FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB WHERE DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT '업무영역' AS CNT_NAME
,TO_CHAR(COUNT(BIZ_AREA_ID), '999,999,999,999') AS TOT_CNT ,'/dq/criinfo/bizarea/bizarea_lst.do?linkFlag=1' AS PAGE FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') -- AND UPP_BIZ_AREA_ID IS NOT NULL AND BIZ_AREA_LVL = (SELECT MAX(BIZ_AREA_LVL) FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA) UNION ALL SELECT '데이터품질지표' AS CNT_NAME
,TO_CHAR(COUNT(DQI_ID), '999,999,999,999') AS TOT_CNT ,'/dq/criinfo/dqi/dqi_lst.do?linkFlag=1' AS PAGE FROM WAM_DQI WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') -- AND UPP_DQI_ID IS NOT NULL AND DQI_LVL = (SELECT MAX(DQI_LVL) FROM WAM_DQI) UNION ALL SELECT '중요정보항목' AS CNT_NAME
,TO_CHAR(COUNT(CTQ_ID), '999,999,999,999') AS TOT_CNT ,'/dq/criinfo/ctq/ctq_lst.do?linkFlag=1' AS PAGE FROM WAM_CTQ WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT '프로파일' AS CNT_NAME
,TO_CHAR(COUNT(PRF_ID), '999,999,999,999') AS TOT_CNT ,'/dq/profile/profile_list.do?linkFlag=1' AS PAGE FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT '업무규칙' AS CNT_NAME
,TO_CHAR(COUNT(BR_ID), '999,999,999,999') AS TOT_CNT ,'/dq/bizrule/bizrule_lst.do?linkFlag=1' AS PAGE FROM WAM_BR_MSTR WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
